issue.title: watch.impress.co.jp
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://watch.impress.co.jp](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwatch.impress.co.jp) ### Comment > You will also lose access to this site's group sites. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/18eo93bpvy4kck00cgsgk0koscc0ow0seya1u7v11c.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/kt1qv6xablcowsokwks0wc04gk0sws83eqah914szs.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.12 RC 1 System version: | `Android 15` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320)

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.cloudflare.com/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard URL Tracking,
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
Legitimate URL Shortener

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Widgets

Security:
uBlock Origin – Badware risks,
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
Scam Blocklist by DurableNapkin,
Phishing URL Blocklist

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Chinese,
EasyList China Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.meta.js`
`https://update.greasyfork.org/scripts/428243/Don't track me Google.meta.js` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=and&product_version=4.12+RC+1&system_version=Android+15&browser=chrome&filters=18.20.257.7.2.101.251.17.208.11.21.19.22.256.104.3.255.224&dns_servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.cloudflare.com%2Fdns-query&userscripts=https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.meta.js%252C%250Ahttps%253A%252F%252Fupdate.greasyfork.org%252Fscripts%252F428243%252FDon%27t%2520track%2520me%2520Google.meta.js&android.mode=VPN&android.system_root=false&dns.filters=https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fandroid%252Ffilters%252F15_optimized.txt&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&https.filtering=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=false&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.first_party_cookies=4320&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&license_type=paid&dns.timeout=5000)
